name: Super Potion
text: Discard 1 Energy card attached to 1 of your own Pokémon in order to remove up to 4 damage counters from that Pokémon.

effect.text: Discard 1 Energy card attached to 1 of your own Pokémon in order to remove up to 4 damage counters from that Pokémon.

weaknesses: Requires discarding Energy from the Pokemon
synergies: High HP Pokemon - Worth the Energy cost
counters: High damage attacks make healing less effective

competitiveHistory: Super Potion saw some play in tanky decks where keeping a Pokemon alive was worth the Energy cost.

rulings.ruling: You must discard 1 Energy from the Pokemon being healed.
You can remove fewer than 4 damage counters if the Pokemon has less damage.
